alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, western Camden, southwestern Glynn, southern Brantley, eastern Ware and northern Charlton Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Race Pond, or 10 miles northeast of Stephen Foster State Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Stephen Foster State Park, Homeland, Hickox, Kings Ferry, Race Pond, Winokur and Tarboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
